title: Rover Dashboard
description: Full-stack real-time rover control and monitoring system with WebSocket communication
longDescription: A comprehensive web-based application for controlling and monitoring autonomous rovers. Features real-time sensor data visualization, remote control capabilities, code deployment features, and persistent data storage for mission analysis.

caseStudy.problem: Need for comprehensive remote rover control and monitoring system with real-time data visualization
caseStudy.solution: Built full-stack application with WebSocket communication, dual database architecture, and hardware abstraction layer
results: Real-time sensor data streaming and visualization
Remote code deployment and rover control capabilities
Persistent session tracking and data analytics
Docker containerized deployment for easy scaling

title: AI ChatBot Interface
description: Modern conversational AI interface with real-time responses and chat history
longDescription: An intelligent chatbot interface featuring modern UI design, real-time message streaming, conversation memory, and customizable AI personalities for enhanced user interaction.

caseStudy.problem: Users needed an intuitive and responsive interface for AI-powered conversations
caseStudy.solution: Developed modern chatbot UI with streaming responses, conversation persistence, and customizable AI personalities
results: Built responsive design for all devices

title: Klb TurfBuddy
description: Comprehensive turf booking platform with Admin, Owner, and User modules
longDescription: Kalaburgu Turf Buddy (KTB) is a complete turf booking application with three modules: Admin, Owner, and User. It allows users to view and book turfs, owners to manage their turfs and bookings, and admins to oversee all activities within the platform.

metrics.impact: Streamlined turf booking & management for a growing user base

caseStudy.problem: Turf owners and players lacked a centralized, easy-to-use platform for managing bookings, payments, and turf availability.
caseStudy.solution: Built a comprehensive multi-module web app with user booking, owner turf management, real-time statistics, and admin-level oversight.
results: Enabled seamless slot booking with Razorpay payments

userModule: Browse and view turfs with details
Book slots with Razorpay payment integration
Receive confirmation emails with booking details & QR codes
Apply to become a turf owner
ownerModule: View booking details and statistics in a dashboard
adminModule: Access complete transaction overview with monthly graphs
